title: Commission
description: Describe the commission of a robot. Used in a request, this describes desired changes to the current commission.

dispatch_tasks.description: Should the robot accept dispatched tasks, true/false. When used in a request, leave this unset to not change the robot's current value.

direct_tasks.description: Should the robot accept direct task requests, true/false. When used in a request, leave this unset to not change the robot's current value.

idle_behavior.description: Should the robot perform its idle behavior, true/false. When used in a request, leave this unset to not change the robot's current value.
